description: Premium quality Makrana white marble slab, famous for its pure white color and fine grain structure. This is the same marble used in the construction of the Taj Mahal. Perfect for luxury flooring, wall cladding, and countertops. Features minimal veining and exceptional polish retention. Ideal for high-end residential and commercial projects.

Premium Absolute Black granite from South India, known for its deep black color without any patterns or veining. This granite offers exceptional durability and low porosity, making it ideal for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and outdoor applications. Polished finish provides a mirror-like reflection. Resistant to heat, scratches, and stains.

Natural Dholpur beige sandstone with uniform texture and warm earthy tones. This sandstone is highly suitable for exterior cladding, garden pathways, pool decks, and interior flooring. Features excellent slip resistance and weather durability. The beige color complements both traditional and contemporary architecture. Easy to maintain and ages beautifully.

Custom-cut Jaisalmer yellow limestone available in various sizes and finishes. This honey-colored limestone is perfect for heritage restoration projects, luxury villas, and traditional architecture. Known for its warmth and natural beauty. We offer custom sizing, edge profiling, and surface finishes including natural, honed, and bush-hammered. Minimum order quantity applies.

Premium quality black slate tiles with natural riven surface texture. Perfect for rustic and contemporary interiors, outdoor patios, and wet areas. Features excellent anti-slip properties and frost resistance. The natural cleft surface provides unique character to each tile. Suitable for both residential and commercial applications. Low maintenance and highly durable.

High-quality full-body vitrified floor tiles with superior strength and durability. Features nano-polished surface for stain resistance and easy maintenance. Suitable for high-traffic commercial and residential areas. Available in contemporary marble look design with consistent pattern throughout. Water absorption less than 0.5%. Tested for slip resistance and chemical resistance.

Classic subway-style ceramic wall tiles with glossy glazed finish. Perfect for modern kitchens, bathrooms, and feature walls. Available in various colors with beveled edges for a premium look. Easy to clean and maintain. Resistant to moisture and thermal shock. Can be installed in brick bond or herringbone pattern for added visual interest. Suitable for both residential and commercial spaces.

Premium wood-effect porcelain tiles that perfectly mimic natural hardwood flooring. Offers the beauty of wood with the durability and low maintenance of porcelain. Suitable for all areas including wet zones. Features realistic wood grain texture and color variation. Frost-proof and suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications. Available in multiple wood tone options. Rectified edges for minimal grout lines.

Stunning glass mosaic tiles perfect for creating eye-catching feature walls, backsplashes, and decorative accents. Made from recycled glass with vibrant colors that won't fade. Each sheet contains small glass pieces in coordinating colors for a sophisticated look. Easy to install on mesh backing. Resistant to water, stains, and chemicals. Ideal for pool surrounds, spa areas, and luxury bathrooms.

productName: Heavy Duty Floor Tiles - Industrial Grade
description: Industrial-grade floor tiles designed for heavy-duty commercial and industrial applications. Features exceptional impact resistance and load-bearing capacity. Anti-slip R11 rated surface suitable for wet and oily conditions. Resistant to chemicals, acids, and thermal shock. Ideal for factories, warehouses, garages, and commercial kitchens. Available in neutral colors for professional appearance. Easy to clean and maintain.

Stunning Imperial Red granite with deep red background and black speckles. This premium-grade granite is highly sought after for its rich color and elegant appearance. Perfect for kitchen countertops, vanity tops, and luxury flooring. Features excellent hardness and durability. Polished to a mirror finish that enhances the natural beauty of the stone. Resistant to scratches, heat, and stains.

Exquisite Crystal White quartzite with subtle grey veining that resembles fine marble. This natural stone offers superior hardness compared to marble while maintaining an elegant appearance. Ideal for high-end countertops, wall cladding, and luxury flooring. Features high resistance to heat, scratches, and etching. Available in polished and honed finishes. UV resistant and suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications.

Premium engineered quartz surface with Calacatta marble look. Composed of 93% natural quartz crystals and high-quality resin for exceptional strength and beauty. Non-porous surface resists stains, bacteria, and scratches. Maintenance-free and does not require sealing. Perfect for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and commercial surfaces. Consistent pattern and color throughout. Available in polished finish with elegant veining.

productName: CNC Carved Granite Panel - Custom Design
description: Custom CNC-carved granite panels for architectural and decorative applications. We can create intricate patterns, logos, lettering, and artistic designs on granite surfaces using advanced CNC technology. Perfect for building facades, feature walls, monuments, and signage. Upload your design or work with our team to create unique patterns. Available in various granite colors. Precision cutting ensures consistent quality and detail.

Beautiful Kashmir White granite featuring white background with grey and burgundy specks. This versatile granite complements both traditional and contemporary designs. Ideal for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and flooring. Known for its consistent pattern and easy maintenance. Highly durable and resistant to daily wear and tear. Available in polished and leathered finishes.

Authentic Italian Statuario marble renowned for its pure white background and dramatic grey veining. This premium marble is considered one of the most prestigious natural stones in the world. Perfect for luxury residential projects, hotel lobbies, and high-end commercial spaces. Each slab is unique with distinctive veining patterns. Suitable for flooring, wall cladding, countertops, and sculptural elements. Requires professional sealing and maintenance.

Custom-made travertine tiles with antique tumbled finish for a rustic Mediterranean look. Available in various sizes and edge treatments. Natural stone with characteristic pitting and veining adds authentic character to any space. Perfect for outdoor patios, pool decks, kitchen backsplashes, and bathroom walls. We offer custom sizing, thickness options, and finish types including tumbled, honed, and brushed. Minimum order quantity applies for custom specifications.

Contemporary terrazzo tiles featuring marble and glass aggregate in cement or epoxy matrix. Our designer collection offers modern interpretations of classic terrazzo with vibrant colors and unique patterns. Perfect for creating statement floors, feature walls, and countertops. Available in large format tiles for minimal grout lines. Durable, low-maintenance, and suitable for high-traffic areas. Each tile is sealed and ready for installation.

Custom decorative concrete panels for architectural applications. We create bespoke concrete elements with integrated colors, textures, and patterns. Perfect for feature walls, facades, and interior design elements. Can incorporate embedded materials, relief patterns, or custom molds. Available in various finishes including polished, exposed aggregate, and board-formed. Ideal for modern minimalist and industrial design aesthetics. Lead time required for custom design and fabrication.

High-quality solid surface resin material for seamless installations. Non-porous acrylic-based material available in wide range of solid colors and patterns. Perfect for countertops, sinks, wall panels, and furniture applications. Can be thermoformed and joined invisibly for custom shapes. Repairable and renewable surface. Resistant to moisture, bacteria, and stains. Ideal for healthcare, hospitality, and residential projects. Easy to fabricate and install.

Premium quality Kota limestone with distinctive beige-brown color and fine grain texture. This durable limestone is perfect for both interior and exterior flooring applications. Features excellent resistance to weathering and minimal maintenance requirements. The natural matte finish provides superior slip resistance, making it ideal for high-traffic areas, commercial spaces, and outdoor installations. Known for its longevity and timeless appeal.

Elegant silver grey travertine with cross-cut finishing that showcases beautiful linear patterns. This premium natural stone features characteristic voids and pitting that add authentic character. Perfect for luxury bathroom walls, feature walls, outdoor cladding, and pool surrounds. Available in filled and unfilled options. The cool grey tones complement both modern and traditional design schemes. Naturally frost-resistant and durable.

productName: Custom Cut Marble Slabs - Premium Selection
description: Bespoke marble cutting service offering custom sizes and edge profiles for your specific project needs. Choose from our extensive selection of premium marbles including Makrana White, Italian Carrara, and Indian Green varieties. We provide precision cutting, edge profiling (beveled, bullnose, ogee), and surface finishing (polished, honed, leathered). Perfect for custom countertops, vanity tops, and unique architectural elements. Minimum order quantity applies.

Beautiful multicolor slate tiles featuring natural variations of rust, gold, green, and grey tones. The riven surface texture provides authentic rustic character and excellent anti-slip properties. Ideal for outdoor patios, pathways, pool decks, and interior feature walls. Each tile is unique with natural color variations. Highly durable and weather-resistant. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary landscaping designs.

High-quality glazed ceramic floor tiles with glossy finish and elegant marble-look design. The glazed surface provides excellent stain resistance and easy maintenance. Suitable for residential living rooms, bedrooms, and light commercial applications. Features consistent color and pattern throughout the batch. Water absorption less than 10%. Available in coordinating wall tile formats for complete design solutions.

Contemporary 3D textured glazed wall tiles that create stunning visual depth and shadow play. The raised geometric pattern adds dimension to any wall surface. Perfect for feature walls, bathroom accents, and modern kitchen backsplashes. Glossy glazed finish enhances light reflection. Easy to clean and maintain. Available in multiple color options to suit various design schemes. Creates a luxurious aesthetic at an affordable price point.

Extra-large format porcelain tiles perfect for creating seamless modern interiors with minimal grout lines. Full-body porcelain construction ensures color consistency throughout the tile thickness. Suitable for both floor and wall applications in residential and commercial projects. Features ultra-low water absorption and exceptional durability. Rectified edges allow for narrow grout joints. Available in contemporary concrete-look finish.

Charming encaustic-style floor tiles featuring traditional geometric patterns and vibrant colors. Perfect for creating vintage-inspired or Mediterranean-style interiors. Each tile combines multiple colors in intricate patterns. Ideal for entryways, kitchens, bathrooms, and commercial spaces seeking a unique aesthetic. Durable ceramic construction with through-body pattern. Easy to maintain and clean. Mix and match with solid color tiles for custom layouts.

Unique mint green sandstone with sawn smooth finish for contemporary applications. This rare colored sandstone offers a fresh, modern aesthetic while maintaining natural stone authenticity. Perfect for feature walls, outdoor paving, and architectural cladding. The subtle green hue pairs beautifully with neutral tones and natural materials. Durable and weather-resistant. Suitable for both residential and commercial landscaping projects.

Stunning Azul Macaubas quartzite featuring vibrant blue tones with white and grey veining. This exotic natural stone is one of the most sought-after quartzites for luxury projects. Perfect for statement countertops, feature walls, and high-end architectural applications. Exceptionally hard and durable with superior scratch and heat resistance. The vivid blue color is UV stable and won't fade. Each slab is unique with natural variation.

Premium engineered stone surface with bright white base and fine glitter sparkle effect. Composed of 94% natural quartz with polymer resin for exceptional durability. Non-porous surface is highly resistant to stains, scratches, and bacteria. Perfect for modern kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, and commercial applications. Requires no sealing and is easy to maintain. The subtle sparkle adds elegance without being overpowering. Consistent color and pattern throughout.

productName: Precision Stone Cutting Service - Any Material
description: Professional stone cutting and fabrication service for natural stones, engineered surfaces, and alternative materials. We offer precision cutting to your exact specifications using state-of-the-art CNC and waterjet technology. Services include straight cuts, curved cuts, sink cutouts, edge profiling, and surface finishing. Perfect for custom countertops, vanity tops, and architectural elements. Bring your own material or choose from our inventory. Fast turnaround time with accurate results.

custom_parameters.chamfers: Custom edge profiles as per drawing

description: Luxury brushed brass metal finish panels for contemporary architectural applications. These metal surface panels combine the warmth of brass with a sophisticated brushed texture. Perfect for feature walls, elevator cladding, furniture accents, and high-end commercial interiors. Lacquer-coated to prevent tarnishing and maintain the golden luster. Easy to clean and maintain. Available in custom sizes upon request. Creates a statement in modern luxury spaces.

Beautiful handcrafted mosaic art panels created by skilled artisans using natural stone pieces. Each panel is a unique work of art featuring intricate patterns and designs. Perfect for luxury residential spaces, boutique hotels, and upscale restaurants. Available in custom designs and sizes. The mosaic technique combines marble, granite, and semi-precious stones to create stunning visual effects. Made to order with attention to detail. Durable and suitable for both indoor and outdoor installations.

Bespoke granite kitchen countertop fabrication service with professional installation. Choose from our selection of premium granites including Absolute Black, Tan Brown, Kashmir White, and Imperial Red. We provide complete countertop solutions including measurement, templating, cutting, edge profiling, and installation. Includes sink cutout and backsplash if required. Our experienced team ensures perfect fit and finish. Minimum 20 sq.ft order.

custom_parameters.chamfers: Bullnose, beveled, or ogee edge available

productName: Vintage Pattern Wall Tiles - Heritage Collection
description: Charming vintage pattern wall tiles inspired by traditional Indian heritage designs. These ceramic tiles feature intricate floral and geometric patterns in soft pastel colors. Perfect for adding character to bathrooms, kitchens, and accent walls. Each tile is carefully crafted to recreate authentic vintage aesthetics. Easy to install and maintain. Pairs beautifully with modern fixtures for an eclectic look. Available in coordinating border tiles.

Premium ultra-black engineered quartz surface with deep, consistent black color throughout. Part of our exclusive Midnight Series, this quartz offers unmatched darkness and uniformity. Composed of 93% natural quartz with advanced polymer technology. Non-porous surface provides superior stain and scratch resistance. Perfect for dramatic modern kitchens, luxury bathrooms, and commercial counters. Heat resistant up to 150C. Maintenance-free with a polished finish that never requires sealing.

Sophisticated engineered stone surface mimicking classic Carrara marble veining. Features white base with elegant grey veins throughout. Superior to natural marble with enhanced durability and zero maintenance. Non-porous surface resists staining and bacterial growth. Perfect for kitchen islands, bathroom vanities, and commercial applications. Consistent pattern ensures easy slab matching for large installations. Available in polished and honed finishes.

Modern polished concrete panels for industrial-chic interior designs. These pre-cast concrete panels feature a smooth, polished surface with natural concrete color variations. Perfect for feature walls, retail displays, and contemporary residential spaces. Sealed surface protects against moisture and staining. Lightweight compared to traditional concrete. Easy to install with mounting system. Creates authentic industrial aesthetic without the cost of poured-in-place concrete.

Innovative translucent resin panels designed for backlit installations. These panels allow light to pass through, creating stunning glowing effects. Perfect for feature walls, partitions, countertops, and artistic installations in hospitality and retail spaces. Can be customized with embedded materials like flowers, leaves, or metallic flakes. Durable acrylic resin construction with UV protection. Available in various colors and thicknesses. Creates dramatic ambiance with integrated LED lighting.

Authentic handmade terracotta floor tiles crafted using traditional methods. Each tile has unique color variations and natural imperfections that add rustic charm. Perfect for Mediterranean, Spanish, and farmhouse-style interiors. Suitable for indoor flooring, outdoor patios, and garden pathways. Porous material ages beautifully with use. Requires sealing for protection. Available in natural terracotta color and various sizes. Creates warm, inviting spaces with timeless appeal.

productName: Custom Marble Inlay Work - Traditional Art
description: Exquisite custom marble inlay work using traditional Pietra Dura technique. Our skilled artisans create intricate designs using semi-precious stones and colored marbles inlaid into white marble base. Perfect for tabletops, floor medallions, wall murals, and decorative panels. Each piece is handcrafted with precision and attention to detail. Choose from traditional floral patterns or custom designs. Suitable for luxury residences, palaces, and high-end commercial spaces.

productName: Stainless Steel Tile Trim - Brushed Finish
description: Premium stainless steel tile trim profiles for professional finishing of tile installations. Brushed finish provides contemporary aesthetic and hides fingerprints. Available in various profiles including L-trim, square edge, and round edge. Perfect for protecting tile edges, creating clean transitions, and adding modern detailing. Corrosion-resistant 304-grade stainless steel. Suitable for both residential and commercial applications. Easy to install and maintain.
